mapper.select: SELECT A.CONUM AS CONUM ,A.COCONTENT AS COCONTENT ,A.MNUM AS MNUM ,B.MNICK AS MNICK ,TO_CHAR(A.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE FROM ICT_COMMENT A, ICT_MEMBER B WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.COTNUM = #{cotnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.MNUM = B.MNUM ORDER BY A.CONUM ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE ICT_COMMENT A SET A.DELETEYN = 'N' WHERE A.CONUM = #{conum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
